title: AI-Powered Document Analyzer
description: AI platform to chat with uploaded PDFs and get instant answers in natural language.
detailedDescription:
A MERN stack document analyzer using a RAG pipeline.
Uploads PDFs, retrieves answers with Gemini API embeddings and LLM pipeline.
Custom chunking improves search accuracy, and TTL-based expiry manages storage.
Secure uploads and sessions are handled with JWT and Multer.

title: AI Question Generator
description: AI interview practice platform with multiple difficulty levels for technical preparation.
detailedDescription: This MERN stack project allows users to practice AI-generated interview questions with three difficulty levels. Questions are generated using the Gemini API based on user experience and skill level. Users can track daily practice, save history, and review past sessions.

title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: Smart personal finance tracker that helps users manage expenses, budgets, and savings efficiently.
detailedDescription: This MERN stack project helps users track their daily expenses, set monthly budgets, and monitor spending habits in real time. Users can categorize expenses, view insightful charts, and understand where their money goes. The app provides clear financial summaries, history tracking, and a simple dashboard to maintain better control over personal finances.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Dark-themed developer portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and technical expertise.
detailedDescription: This portfolio is built using React.js and Tailwind CSS with a fully dark user interface for a modern and focused look. It presents my projects, skills, and tools in a clean, responsive layout with smooth navigation. The design emphasizes simplicity, readability, and user experience while keeping performance in mind. It acts as a central place to showcase my development work, technical stack, and professional journey.

title: LeetCode Analyzer
description: LeetCode analyzer that visualizes coding progress, stats, and problem-solving patterns clearly.
detailedDescription: This project is built using React.js and Tailwind CSS and integrates an external public API to fetch LeetCode user data. It displays detailed statistics like solved problems, difficulty distribution, streaks, and activity patterns in a clean dashboard. Users can quickly understand their coding progress through visual insights and organized data. The focus of this project is on API integration, data visualization, and a responsive user interface.

title: Weather App
description: Simple weather app that shows real-time weather data using a public API.
detailedDescription: This weather app is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and fetches live weather data from a public API. Users can search for any city to view current temperature, weather conditions, humidity, and wind speed. The interface is clean, responsive, and easy to use across devices. This project focuses on API integration, DOM manipulation, and building interactive UI with vanilla JavaScript
